content_fields.desc: **Required.** A description of the video e.g. 'Gangnam style', or some kind of content description for accessibility e.g. 'video attachment'.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: Metadata about the video clip referred to in ``url``.
content_fields.title: VideoInfo

content_fields.desc:
Required if the file is unencrypted. The URL (typically `MXC URI`_)
to the video clip.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
Required if the file is encrypted. Information on the encrypted
file, as specified in |encrypted_files|_.
content_fields.title: EncryptedFile

content_fields.desc: The duration of the video in milliseconds.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: The height of the video in pixels.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: The width of the video in pixels.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: The mimetype of the video e.g. ``video/mp4``.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: The size of the video in bytes.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc:
The URL (typically `MXC URI`_) to an image thumbnail of
the video clip. Only present if the thumbnail is unencrypted.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
Information on the encrypted thumbnail file, as specified in
|encrypted_files|_. Only present if the thumbnail is encrypted.
content_fields.title: EncryptedFile

content_fields.desc: Metadata about the image referred to in ``thumbnail_url``.
content_fields.title: ThumbnailInfo

content_fields.desc:
The intended display height of the image in pixels. This may
differ from the intrinsic dimensions of the image file.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc:
The intended display width of the image in pixels. This may
differ from the intrinsic dimensions of the image file.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: The mimetype of the image, e.g. ``image/jpeg``.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: Size of the image in bytes.
content_fields.title: integer

desc: This message represents a single video clip.
title: VideoMessage
